rows.name: TaskQueue Table
rows.templateDescription: A table with a title, space for filters,...

state.name: formCreateTaskQueue.body.concurrency
state.label: %{Concurrency}
state.after: 0 means serial.1 means parallel. 10 means 10 tasks can run in parallel.

state.name: formCreateTaskQueue.body.blockWindow
state.label: %{Block Window}
state.after: There will be no tasks taken from the queue in the blocked window.

state.label: %{Concurrency}
state.after: 0 means serial.1 means parallel. 10 means 10 tasks can run in parallel.

state.name: formUpdateTaskQueue.body.blockWindow
state.label: %{Block Window}
state.after: There will be no tasks taken from the queue in the blocked window.
